text: Heliconia obscura is a species of plant in the family Heliconiaceae.Dodson, Calaway Homer & Gentry, Alwyn Howard. 1978. Selbyana 2: 297–298, f. 2D. Heliconia obscura It is native to Ecuador and Peru.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families, Heliconia obscura Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests and subtropical or tropical moist montane forests.Ulloa Ulloa, C. & Pitman, N. 2004. Heliconia obscura.2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Heliconia obscura
